pageProduct.name: Pain Away Heat Joint & Muscle Pain Relief Spray 100ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

For Relief and Recovery of Joints & Muscles. Pain Away's active ingredients are traditionally used in western herbal medicine for the relief of - Symptoms of mild arthritis, bruising, mild joint pain and inflammation, muscle pain and inflammation, muscle sprains, strains & soreness.

Warnings

External use only - Avoid contact with eyes, open wounds & mucous membranes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Contains Methyl Salicylate. Do not use if pregnant / planning pregnancy. Do not use in children under 6 years of age. Application to the skin may increase sensitivity to sunlight. Avoid prolonged sun exposure. If you have sensitive skin, test this product on a small area of skin before applying it to a large area. Contains ethanol.

Ingredients

Arnica Montana Flower Tincture, Eucalyptus Oil, Wintergreen Oil. Also contains Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E.

Directions

Directions for use - Shake well before use. Most effective when liberally applied, Eg. 4-6 pumps of the spray on affected and most importantly surrounding areas (before, during and after everyday & sporting activities). Lightly rub in and reapply after 30 seconds. For optimum results, repeat 4-5 times daily for 3 to 5 days. When you feel acute pain has subsided, use Pain Away Heat Pain Relief Spray at least once each morning & evening for continued temporary relief. If symptoms persist talk to your health professional.
